transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed

transcript.speaker: (Black screen, with caption
transcript.dialogue: "SOMEWHERE IN THE NORTH ATLANTIC", with sonar "ping" sound in background. Fade in to darkened set; Space Ghost is looking out the window.)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, what's our depth?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (reading a book) Twenty thousand leagues, sir.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Take her to twenty-one.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Twenty-one?!  But, why?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Because it's more fantastical.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Don't answer it.  It's evil Doctor Reef.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I'm answering it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Don't.  If you open that door, we'll drown.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh, yeah?  Good.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: My god!  Wooden eels!  Surface!  Surface!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Speed up! No, not that fast! (pile of lumber slides across the stage) Slow down!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (throws lever again, a frowning "smiley" appears on his monitor)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm blacking out! (his voice echos, as his image becomes a flashing black and white outline, which fades away to be replaced by background of stars)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak is dead!  Murdered! (sound of crashing and mayhem again) Moltar, serve the first course!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Aye aye, Cap'n!  Cole slaw, comin' up!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: The only thing we can do now is eat.  And bring out my first suspect.

transcript.speaker: Busta Rhymes
transcript.dialogue: Thank you, Mr. Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Busta, Zorak's skull has been fractured.  With what appears to be... (looks at pipe wrench that he is holding)... a wrench.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (wakes up) This dinner mystery sucks.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (jumps up and stomps on Zorak's head) Which was last in my hand.  In the veranda.  Where I was loosening the gas pipe.

transcript.speaker: Busta Rhymes
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) I see, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Is it possible we surfaced too rapidly?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (stands up, holding a script) Rrreah!  That's it.  I'm not doing this anymore.  This whole thing sucks.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What are you not doing anymore?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: This!  The whole thing with the sub.  We're not underwater.  I knew this was a dumbass idea.

transcript.speaker: Busta Rhymes
transcript.dialogue: Oh, man, you'd better not play that game with me, Zorak could get a nice Jackie Chan chop right in the back of his neck.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hang on, y'all.  (reaches into his cape and pulls out the pipe wrench)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: What's that for?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Do not (hits Zorak on the head with the wrench) disturb (hits him again) the judge! (hits him again; each time, Zorak yells "ow!")

transcript.speaker: Busta Rhymes
transcript.dialogue: Dang!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: God, that was violent.  I blame... the sea.

transcript.speaker: Busta Rhymes
transcript.dialogue: You need to give me... a pair of them laser wrist things you be running around the place with.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Why?

transcript.speaker: Busta Rhymes
transcript.dialogue: I'm gonna use 'em.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: For what?

transcript.speaker: Busta Rhymes
transcript.dialogue: I might use 'em to zap you with 'em.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay.

transcript.speaker: Busta Rhymes
transcript.dialogue: Give 'em to me.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I will.

transcript.speaker: Busta Rhymes
transcript.dialogue: So let me have it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I will.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Where do you want this (SG knocks the bowl to the floor, with a crash) ... Captain?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: We're in silent running here.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (LAUGHS) Okay, fine.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (shouting) Moltar!  We are in silent running!  Do you understand the concept of silent running?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Eh, you want another one?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (whispering) Silent.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Okay, fine.

transcript.speaker: Busta Rhymes
transcript.dialogue: So what are you giving me such a hard time with giving the lasers?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What are you talking about?  Moltar!  Make a fire with these eels!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Aye aye, Cap'n.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (quietly) But be quiet.  We're underwater.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No, man, we surfaced.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You handle the salads until you get killed!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: You told me to surface, so... that's, that's what I did.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (walking back and forth) Now, wood pile, did you or did you not masquerade as eels and shock Zorak with that wrench?  Answer me!  Now what about these beans?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Those must have fallen out of my hair.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Well, you're just making all this [BLEEP] up.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oh, what, you're the only one that gets to make [BLEEP] up?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (sighes) Those are part of the dinner.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No they're not.  They're part of the plot.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: They were on the menu.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Murder is on the menu.  Look, bean prints on the wrench.  But what is the wrench for?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: That's where you were trying to fix the, uh, gas leak, and you made it leak.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Is that where I got all these ideas? 'Cause they're brilliant! Hey! Break all the pipes in the sub for more good ideas!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Dive!  Dive!  Suck on the pipes! (klaxons sound)

transcript.speaker: Busta Rhymes
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost is definately with it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hang on, Busta!  We're going underwater.

transcript.speaker: Busta Rhymes
transcript.dialogue: All right, Spacey.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay.

transcript.speaker: Busta Rhymes
transcript.dialogue: You little freaky...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (stands up, groggy) Uhh, ahhh... what happened?

transcript.speaker: Busta Rhymes
transcript.dialogue: Doing that little funny thing, you'd better watch that, man.

transcript.speaker: Busta Rhymes
transcript.dialogue: You don't play no games from the year 2000 and change.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Look, I pieced it together.  (BUSTA LAUGHS) Zorak wasn't dead, but now he is.

transcript.speaker: Busta Rhymes
transcript.dialogue: Crazy Zorak, man.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And then you showed up.

transcript.speaker: Busta Rhymes
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, I know man, but, you know, you seem like a cool cat.  You need to come and hang out with us so you can learn what that twitchin' is all about.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (JUMPS UP ON SG'S DESK) Hey, man, don't stand on the floor.  The floor is spoiled.  Like milk.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (HIDING BEHIND DESK) This is so weird, isn't it?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey... hey, Busta.  Busta?

transcript.speaker: Busta Rhymes
transcript.dialogue: Yes?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (FROM BEHIND MOLTAR) Remember when I licked the back of Jack's skull?

transcript.speaker: Busta Rhymes
transcript.dialogue: Jack?  Who's Jack?  Where... where did Jack come from?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I mean Zorak.  Zorak was who I licked.  No, wait, no, it was Brak. Ah, nobody cares.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost 2
transcript.dialogue: Hey, let's go outside and do the show in the woods.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost 1
transcript.dialogue: Okay.

transcript.speaker: Busta Rhymes
transcript.dialogue: I just think that this is, this... this, you know, this, the way the events have occured in the last year has been really disasterous for, not just people, but, you know, enertainment and, you know, many other things on the whole, and...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (normal voice) I'm not getting one good idea.

transcript.speaker: Busta Rhymes
transcript.dialogue: I think that if we don't start...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Let's go back inside where the gas is.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Get up, Zorak.  (Throws Zorak across set) The gas is giving me an idea.  (everyone's voices become high pitched again) Everything I do and say should be recorded by cameras.  Do you think that Walt would be interested in that?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (high pitched) Uh, Walt Disney's dead.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Who killed Walt Disney? With a wrench?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No one.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Walt Disney makes me sweat.  Is he gonna sue us?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Walt Disney is dead!!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I know!  My God, how many times do I have to tell you that?  Hey, wood! (beat) We should build something.

transcript.speaker: (Black screen with caption
transcript.dialogue: "SEVEN HOURS LATER".  Cut to set.  Two boards are nailed together in an upside-down v shape.  An extension cord is taped to one board.)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Wow.  What's it do?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It's symbolic, Moltar.  Things don't always have to do things. Now, help me plug it into the wall.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Look, uh, maybe we should just revive Zorak and talk to the guest or something.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What?  And just leave the eels here?  That's insane.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What happened to you?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I was hit with a wrench.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (hits Zorak with wrench again) We have to get you to the hospital.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What kind of hospital is this?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What kind of a hospital was that?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: You just missed the turn.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hold on, watch this.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, talk to me, are you okay?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No, ugh, I'm hurt.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, don't worry, I'll fix that.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Ugh, I'm passin' out.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: We have to get you to the hospital.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Ugh.  What's all this? Ugh...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You can pick anything.  Pick anything you like.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I need toilet paper.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Ugh, I need some flavor ice.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: And pudding.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Did you see the lights flicker?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (looks) No.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Look at it but don't blink.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (coughs)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: What are we doing?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Wait, did it just do it again?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I'm gonna go.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It did it again.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Don't follow me.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Hang on, I'm going with ya. (hops after Zorak)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Not so fast.  Roll call.  Moltar.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Dead.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Eat me.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Buster.  Where's Buster?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: This seems like as good a time as any to welcome our first new sponsor.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost 2
transcript.dialogue: Natural gas.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost 4
transcript.dialogue: It gives you some ideas.  (More Space Ghosts appear, including SG in a tennis skirt, from "Joshua". All of the Space Ghosts laugh)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Shut up!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (sounding far away) Shut up!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Where's Zorak?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: He crawled into the heating duct.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You snitch!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Why?  Turn up the heat.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (Pulls lever; ventilation fans spin up)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (staring at duct) Good.  (walks over to opening in the duct) Zorak, get out here before I hit you.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: No.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar and I are out here doing my damnedest to put on the best talk show possible.  And you're balled up in here like a big green tarantula.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I ain't coming out, man.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: How'd you fit in here? (beat) Zorak.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I need to be alone.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Did you speak with the orb?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: No.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Let me just touch your skin. (pulls out his pipe wrench)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: No.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (knocks off the vent cover with the wrench and laughs) But now, it's time for you to come down and make America happy. (flies up into the vent opening)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Just get away!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: God, it's hot in here.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Get out of here!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm stuck.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Get out!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm stuck!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Get out!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Look at me, Zorak, now I'm stuck.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (his eyes peering back from the darkness) Get out of here!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Are you happy?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: GET OUT!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, grab my ankles and pull.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (pulls on Space Ghost's ankles) Just let go.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Come on, Moltar.  Zorak needs to be alone.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: You have to let go!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: GET OUT!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Come over here.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Back off!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm gonna bite your head off.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Get out!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Your boot came off.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, grab my ankles and pull!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I wonder if that's drinkable.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (starts speaking nonsense sounds, then his voice goes into a tight loop)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: This goes on for a while.  Like an hour.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: But I got out, right?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Yeah... but then you got back in.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Did you get the part where I was Space Ghost, a Tribute to Freedom?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No, we recorded over that.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I mean, I couldn't find it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (with sanded off face) Then what was the point of sanding my face off?
